title: Privy
shortDescription: Free exit intent popups, flyouts, and banners to grow your list.
longDescription:
Privy is trusted by over 100,000 businesses, small and large, to capture and convert website visitors. 
With Privy, you'll never need another popup, coupon or abandoned cart app again.
Privy's integration lets you set up your account in seconds and get your first campaign live right away, for free.

- Rapidly grow your email list and store sales with high converting pop-ups and offers with bulk coupon codes
- Trigger popups using exit intent, time on site, scroll, cart size and more. A/B test campaigns.
- Easily integrate with ecommerce platforms and website builders including Shopify, ShopifyPlus, Magento2, Squarespace, Hubspot, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, and more.
- Maximized your conversion rates with A/B campaign testing.
- Sync contacts with all email marketing platforms including Mailchimp, Bronto, Klaviyo, Soundest, Adroll, Zapier and more.

# What is Privy?

Privy's free suite of email capture tools, including exit-intent driven website popups & banners, help you grow your email list from your website, online store, social media channels, mobile, and in-store traffic. All without any coding or development skills needed.
- Customizable, mobile friendly display types including popups, banners, flyouts, scroll boxes, announcement bars, and embedded forms for email collection
- Single use, and bulk coupon code integration. Surface coupon codes in your popups, or in immediate email autoresponders
- Display and target campaigns based on exit, cart abandonment, cart value, scroll, timer, geography, device type, page, number of visits, referral site, language and more
- Run automated A/B split tests to understand how small changes impact conversion rates
- Offer redemption tracking for either ecommerce or in-store transactions
- Add free shipping bars to any page in your store
- Send reminder emails to turn signups into sales

# Simple, Powerful Campaign Designer

Using our WYSIWYG designer you can launch campaigns in minutes. Choose from dozens of our high-converting, ready to use templates or fully customize the design to match the look and feel of your brand. It's your choice.
- Popups
- Overlays
- Bars
- Banners
- Flyouts
- Embedded forms
- Tabs

# Robust Targeting Capabilities

Use advanced targeting capabilities to deliver the right message to the right visitor to your store based on one or more of the following:
 - Device targeting
 - Shopping cart behavior targeting
- Current page targeting
- Initial URL targeting
- Referral source targeting
- Traffic type targeting
- Frequency targeting
- Country targeting
- Language targeting
- Privy campaign history targeting
- Time and date targeting

# Integrated with Your Email Service Provider

Connecting Privy with your current email service provider takes seconds and makes it easy to effectively grow and utilize your email list.
- Automatically sync new contacts to specific lists for dozens of top email providers
- Sync custom fields to your email provider whenever someone signs up and trigger automated email series.
# Automated Coupon Reminders and Welcome Series

- Send autoresponder emails directly from within Privy that include Master or Unique Coupon codes.
- Send timed reminder emails based on whether or not a code has been redeemed.
- Create email welcome series to drive repeat visits to your store.

# High-Converting Campaign Triggers

Decide when you want to show your offer to store visitors based on one or more triggers:
- Amount of time they have been on a page
- Percentage of scrolling down the page
- When they attempt to leave your site
- Frequency of visits to your site

# Real-Time Conversion Centric Reporting

With Privy you'll know exactly how your campaigns are performing at all times:
- Real-time dashboards that show how your campaigns are performing in real-time on a number of key metrics.
- Email notifications: Receive an email whenever someone signs up from each of your campaigns.
- A/B testing: Set up automated split tests to understand how display type, messaging, triggers or visuals impact opt-in rates.
Proven Results
- Over 100,000 sites in 180 countries
- Captured over 23 million emails
- Driving over 3MM checkouts every month

### Start turning unknown visitors to your store into customers with our free forever plan today.
author: Privy Inc.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Get started with unlimited campaigns and signups, and access to every trigger and display type.

products.title: Plus
products.shortDescription: Improve your campaigns with device and URL Targeting, white label, and more.
products.longDescription:
All features included in Free, plus:

- Unlimited campaigns
- Unlimited sign-up volume
- Unlimited landing pages
- Pop-up, flyout, banner, spin to win, full screen, embed, and bar displays
- Exit-intent, scroll, and time based triggers
- Automated email sync 
- Drag and drop  campaign designer
- Master coupon code distribution
- Reporting dashboard
- 1 User
- Up to 3 Integrations
- Chat and email support
- 3000 Autoresponder sends per month

products.title: Commerce
products.shortDescription: Optimize for ecommerce with cart targeting, unique coupon codes, and more.
products.longDescription:
All features included in Free / Plus and:

- Cart value targeting
- Referring URL /  traffic type targeting
- Language and location targeting
- Session and page view targeting
- Campaign history targeting
- Unique coupon code distribution
- Redemption tracking
- Advanced email sync
- Custom fonts
- Embed video and other HTML
- Up to 3 Users
- Up to 10 Integrations
- Prioritized chat and email support
- Onboarding call
- 24,000 autoresponder sends per month

products.title: Growth
products.shortDescription: Continually test and improve with A/B Testing, custom CSS, user analytics, and more
products.longDescription:
All features included in Free / Plus / Commerce and:

- A/B testing for campaigns
- Custom JavaScript & CSS
- Dynamic form fields
- Detected attributes
- User analytics
- Conversion tracking pixels
- Up to 10 Users
- Unlimited Integrations
- 3 Domains/stores
- Prioritized chat and email support
- Onboarding call
- Regularly scheduled check-in calls
- 60,000 Autoresponder sends per month

proposedApp.title: Privy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Free email collection popups, flyouts, banners, and bars
proposedApp.longDescription:
* **Rapidly grow your email list with high-converting popups, banners, bars, and flyouts**
* **Trigger popups using exit-intent, time on site, scroll, cart abandonment and more**
* **Incentivize signups with trackable offers and coupon codes**
* **A/B test campaigns to maximize your conversion rates**
* **Integrate with all email marketing platforms, including Mailchimp, Bronto, Klaviyo, Soundest, Adroll, Zapier and more**

Grow your email list for free with Privy! Privy's suite of email capture tools — including exit-intent driven website popups, banners, and bars — will help you grow your email list from your website, social media, mobile, and in-store traffic. Instantly sync collected contacts with your email marketing software including Mailchimp, Bronto, Klaviyo, Soundest, bizzy, Conversio, Active Campaign, Mad Mimi, Emma, Constant Contact, Hubspot, InfusionSoft, Zapier and many more. Even sync to your AdRoll retargeting account.

**Privy's platform includes:**

- Customizable, mobile-friendly displays for email collection: popups, banners, flyouts, scroll boxes, announcement bars, embedded forms, and landing pages

- Single-use and bulk coupon code integration. Surface coupon codes in your popups or email autoresponders after a contact signs up

- Display and target campaigns based on exit, cart abandonment, cart value, scroll, timer, geography, device type, page, number of visits, referral site, and more

- Run automated A/B split tests to understand how small changes impact conversion rates

- Offer-driven autoresponder emails sent when contacts sign up

- Offer redemption tracking for either ecommerce or in-store transactions

__Privy is trusted by over 100,000 businesses, small and large. You'll never need another popup, coupon or abandoned cart app ever again.__
proposedApp.instructions:
1. Sign up for a new Privy account at https://dashboard.privy.com/users/sign_up
2. Visit https://dashboard.privy.com/settings/widget and copy your Privy account identifier
3. Paste your account identifier in the account identifier field within your cloudflare app and save

That's it! Privy is now installed on your site. Follow the remaining onboarding steps within your Privy dashboard to set up your first Privy campaign.

proposedApp.longDescription:
Privy is trusted by over 100,000 businesses, small and large, to capture and convert website visitors. 
With Privy, you'll never need another popup, coupon or abandoned cart app again.
Privy's integration lets you set up your account in seconds and get your first campaign live right away, for free.

- Rapidly grow your email list and store sales with high converting pop-ups and offers with bulk coupon codes
- Trigger popups using exit intent, time on site, scroll, cart size and more. A/B test campaigns.
- Easily integrate with ecommerce platforms and website builders including Shopify, ShopifyPlus, Magento2, Squarespace, Hubspot, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, and more.
- Maximized your conversion rates with A/B campaign testing.
- Sync contacts with all email marketing platforms including Mailchimp, Bronto, Klaviyo, Soundest, Adroll, Zapier and more.

# What is Privy?

Privy's free suite of email capture tools, including exit-intent driven website popups & banners, help you grow your email list from your website, online store, social media channels, mobile, and in-store traffic. All without any coding or development skills needed.
- Customizable, mobile friendly display types including popups, banners, flyouts, scroll boxes, announcement bars, and embedded forms for email collection
- Single use, and bulk coupon code integration. Surface coupon codes in your popups, or in immediate email autoresponders
- Display and target campaigns based on exit, cart abandonment, cart value, scroll, timer, geography, device type, page, number of visits, referral site, language and more
- Run automated A/B split tests to understand how small changes impact conversion rates
- Offer redemption tracking for either ecommerce or in-store transactions
- Add free shipping bars to any page in your store
- Send reminder emails to turn signups into sales

# Simple, Powerful Campaign Designer

Using our WYSIWYG designer you can launch campaigns in minutes. Choose from dozens of our high-converting, ready to use templates or fully customize the design to match the look and feel of your brand. It's your choice.
- Popups
- Overlays
- Bars
- Banners
- Flyouts
- Embedded forms
- Tabs

# Robust Targeting Capabilities

Use advanced targeting capabilities to deliver the right message to the right visitor to your store based on one or more of the following:
 - Device targeting
 - Shopping cart behavior targeting
- Current page targeting
- Initial URL targeting
- Referral source targeting
- Traffic type targeting
- Frequency targeting
- Country targeting
- Language targeting
- Privy campaign history targeting
- Time and date targeting

# Integrated with Your Email Service Provider

Connecting Privy with your current email service provider takes seconds and makes it easy to effectively grow and utilize your email list.
- Automatically sync new contacts to specific lists for dozens of top email providers
- Sync custom fields to your email provider whenever someone signs up and trigger automated email series.
# Automated Coupon Reminders and Welcome Series

- Send autoresponder emails directly from within Privy that include Master or Unique Coupon codes.
- Send timed reminder emails based on whether or not a code has been redeemed.
- Create email welcome series to drive repeat visits to your store.

# High-Converting Campaign Triggers

Decide when you want to show your offer to store visitors based on one or more triggers:
- Amount of time they have been on a page
- Percentage of scrolling down the page
- When they attempt to leave your site
- Frequency of visits to your site

# Real-Time Conversion Centric Reporting

With Privy you'll know exactly how your campaigns are performing at all times:
- Real-time dashboards that show how your campaigns are performing in real-time on a number of key metrics.
- Email notifications: Receive an email whenever someone signs up from each of your campaigns.
- A/B testing: Set up automated split tests to understand how display type, messaging, triggers or visuals impact opt-in rates.
Proven Results
- Over 100,000 sites in 180 countries
- Captured over 23 million emails
- Driving over 3MM checkouts every month

### Start turning unknown visitors to your store into customers with our free forever plan today.

proposedApp.title: Privy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Free exit intent popups, flyouts, and banners to grow your list.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Privy is trusted by over 100,000 businesses, small and large, to capture and convert website visitors. 
With Privy, you'll never need another popup, coupon or abandoned cart app again.
Privy's integration lets you set up your account in seconds and get your first campaign live right away, for free.

- Rapidly grow your email list and store sales with high converting pop-ups and offers with bulk coupon codes
- Trigger popups using exit intent, time on site, scroll, cart size and more. A/B test campaigns.
- Easily integrate with ecommerce platforms and website builders including Shopify, ShopifyPlus, Magento2, Squarespace, Hubspot, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, and more.
- Maximized your conversion rates with A/B campaign testing.
- Sync contacts with all email marketing platforms including Mailchimp, Bronto, Klaviyo, Soundest, Adroll, Zapier and more.

# What is Privy?

Privy's free suite of email capture tools, including exit-intent driven website popups & banners, help you grow your email list from your website, online store, social media channels, mobile, and in-store traffic. All without any coding or development skills needed.
- Customizable, mobile friendly display types including popups, banners, flyouts, scroll boxes, announcement bars, and embedded forms for email collection
- Single use, and bulk coupon code integration. Surface coupon codes in your popups, or in immediate email autoresponders
- Display and target campaigns based on exit, cart abandonment, cart value, scroll, timer, geography, device type, page, number of visits, referral site, language and more
- Run automated A/B split tests to understand how small changes impact conversion rates
- Offer redemption tracking for either ecommerce or in-store transactions
- Add free shipping bars to any page in your store
- Send reminder emails to turn signups into sales

# Simple, Powerful Campaign Designer

Using our WYSIWYG designer you can launch campaigns in minutes. Choose from dozens of our high-converting, ready to use templates or fully customize the design to match the look and feel of your brand. It's your choice.
- Popups
- Overlays
- Bars
- Banners
- Flyouts
- Embedded forms
- Tabs

# Robust Targeting Capabilities

Use advanced targeting capabilities to deliver the right message to the right visitor to your store based on one or more of the following:
 - Device targeting
 - Shopping cart behavior targeting
- Current page targeting
- Initial URL targeting
- Referral source targeting
- Traffic type targeting
- Frequency targeting
- Country targeting
- Language targeting
- Privy campaign history targeting
- Time and date targeting

# Integrated with Your Email Service Provider

Connecting Privy with your current email service provider takes seconds and makes it easy to effectively grow and utilize your email list.
- Automatically sync new contacts to specific lists for dozens of top email providers
- Sync custom fields to your email provider whenever someone signs up and trigger automated email series.
# Automated Coupon Reminders and Welcome Series

- Send autoresponder emails directly from within Privy that include Master or Unique Coupon codes.
- Send timed reminder emails based on whether or not a code has been redeemed.
- Create email welcome series to drive repeat visits to your store.

# High-Converting Campaign Triggers

Decide when you want to show your offer to store visitors based on one or more triggers:
- Amount of time they have been on a page
- Percentage of scrolling down the page
- When they attempt to leave your site
- Frequency of visits to your site

# Real-Time Conversion Centric Reporting

With Privy you'll know exactly how your campaigns are performing at all times:
- Real-time dashboards that show how your campaigns are performing in real-time on a number of key metrics.
- Email notifications: Receive an email whenever someone signs up from each of your campaigns.
- A/B testing: Set up automated split tests to understand how display type, messaging, triggers or visuals impact opt-in rates.
Proven Results
- Over 100,000 sites in 180 countries
- Captured over 23 million emails
- Driving over 3MM checkouts every month

### Start turning unknown visitors to your store into customers with our free forever plan today.

- Frequency of visits to your site

# Real-Time Conversion Centric Reporting

With Privy you'll know exactly how your campaigns are performing at all times:
- Real-time dashboards that show how your campaigns are performing in real-time on a number of key metrics.
- Email notifications: Receive an email whenever someone signs up from each of your campaigns.
- A/B testing: Set up automated split tests to understand how display type, messaging, triggers or visuals impact opt-in rates.
Proven Results
- Over 100,000 sites in 180 countries
- Captured over 23 million emails
- Driving over 3MM checkouts every month

### Start turning unknown visitors to your store into customers with our free forever plan today.

proposedApp.title: Privy
proposedApp.shortDescription: Free exit intent popups, flyouts & banners to grow your list
proposedApp.longDescription:
**Privy is trusted by over 100,000 businesses, small and large, to capture and convert website visitors. With Privy, you'll never need another popup, coupon or abandoned cart app again.
**Privy's integration lets you set up your account in seconds and get your first campaign live right away, for free.**

***Rapidly grow your email list and store sales with high converting pop-ups and offers with bulk coupon codes**
***Trigger popups using exit intent, time on site, scroll, cart size and more. A/B test campaigns.**
***Easily integrate with ecommerce platforms and website builders including Shopify, ShopifyPlus, Magento2, Squarespace, Hubspot, BigCommerce, WooCommerce, and more.**
***Maximized your conversion rates with A/B campaign testing**
* **Sync contacts with all email marketing platforms including Mailchimp, Bronto, Klaviyo, Soundest, Adroll, Zapier and more**

**What is Privy?**
Privy's free suite of email capture tools, including exit-intent driven website popups & banners, help you grow your email list from your website, online store, social media channels, mobile, and in-store traffic. All without any coding or development skills needed.
- Customizable, mobile friendly display types including popups, banners, flyouts, scroll boxes, announcement bars, and embedded forms for email collection
- Single use, and bulk coupon code integration. Surface coupon codes in your popups, or in immediate email autoresponders
- Display and target campaigns based on exit, cart abandonment, cart value, scroll, timer, geography, device type, page, number of visits, referral site, language and more
- Run automated A/B split tests to understand how small changes impact conversion rates
- Offer redemption tracking for either ecommerce or in-store transactions
- Add free shipping bars to any page in your store
- Send reminder emails to turn signups into sales

**Simple, Powerful Campaign Designer**
Using our WYSIWYG designer you can launch campaigns in minutes. Choose from dozens of our high-converting, ready to use templates or fully customize the design to match the look and feel of your brand. It's your choice.
- Popups
- Overlays
- Bars
- Banners
- Flyouts
- Embedded forms
- Tabs

**Robust Targeting Capabilities**
Use advanced targeting capabilities to deliver the right message to the right visitor to your store based on one or more of the following:
 - Device targeting
 - Shopping cart behavior targeting
- Current page targeting
- Initial URL targeting
- Referral source targeting
- Traffic type targeting
- Frequency targeting
- Country targeting
- Language targeting
- Privy campaign history targeting
- Time and date targeting

**Integrated with Your Email Service Provider**
Connecting Privy with your current email service provider takes seconds and makes it easy to effectively grow and utilize your email list.
- Automatically sync new contacts to specific lists for dozens of top email providers
- Sync custom fields to your email provider whenever someone signs up and trigger automated email series.
**Automated Coupon Reminders and Welcome Series**
- Send autoresponder emails directly from within Privy that include Master or Unique Coupon codes.
- Send timed reminder emails based on whether or not a code has been redeemed.
- Create email welcome series to drive repeat visits to your store.

**High-Converting Campaign Triggers**
Decide when you want to show your offer to store visitors based on one or more triggers:
- Amount of time they have been on a page
- Percentage of scrolling down the page
- When they attempt to leave your site
- Frequency of visits to your site

**Real-Time Conversion Centric Reporting**
With Privy you'll know exactly how your campaigns are performing at all times:
- Real-time dashboards that show how your campaigns are performing in real-time on a number of key metrics.
- Email notifications: Receive an email whenever someone signs up from each of your campaigns.
- A/B testing: Set up automated split tests to understand how display type, messaging, triggers or visuals impact opt-in rates.
Proven Results
- Over 100,000 sites in 180 countries
- Captured over 23 million emails
- Driving over 3MM checkouts every month
**Start turning unknown visitors to your store into customers with our free forever plan today.**
